ASCII Stream by Gonzalo Hirsch

Click "Start" to stream...

Controls

50
16

Convert yourself to ASCII

Click Start to enable the webcam and let the site process you into ASCII. You can change the Threshold Factor to change the image noise; a higher threshold produces a cleaner image. Changing Frames Per Second can produce smoother video at the cost of performance. Colorizing the image will result in less performance, and I don't recommend opening Dev Tools while streaming (Colorizing is not available on mobile devices due to performance limitations).

If you find a frame you like, click Copy Frame to copy it to the clipboard, otherwise use Download Frame to store it as a PNG (Downloading colored frames doesn't work very well).

Note: Resizing the screen while streaming might cause issues, I recommend stopping and then starting again.

All the code for this project can be found on Github.
